article: We all know something about Thomas Edison. He was a great American  _  .He was in school for only a short time.  Later on  , he had to leave the school and  teach  himself at home and learned a lot. When Edison grew up, he had his own lab. He worked hard and hardly  _  to have a rest. One day a friend of his brought a young man into his lab. He  _  the young man to Edison. He said the young man had studied in a famous university in Germany and had a lot of  _  of physics and maths. Edison was glad to work with a man like him and  _  him as a helper. A few weeks later, the young  _  about Edison's past. He began to look down on him. Edison  was told  about it, but he said  _  . Once the young man came into the lab while Edison  was doing  an important experiment. He stood near the table  _  he didn't help him. Edison stopped  to bring  out a bottle and said, "Go to calculate its volume and tell me the  _  in two hours." At first the young man thought it easy to do it. Soon he  _  it difficult. Two hours later Edison went into his office and saw a lot of paper and books on his desk. Of course he couldn't compute the volume in the time  _  . "Why not pour some  _  into the bottle?" said Edison. "Then you'll  _  calculate its volume!" Having heard this, the young man's  _  turned red, and he knew Edison was really  cleverer  than him!
